attributes.action: Sentence rioters to clear up the damage they have caused and to assist businesses that they have impacted.
attributes.additional_details:
Sentence the rioters to help clear up the damage that they have caused. Further community work to include them helping those business that they have vandalised and / or looted.
Offenders to perform this community work in highly visible jackets or tabards that identify them as a convicted rioter.
